name: Does anyone know of a discord or someplace else to find people to play modules with?
author: Rumbly_The_Smith

posts.author: Rumbly_The_Smith
posts.content: I've been getting that "bug" to play through modules with someone, as playing games with other people are more fun than playing them by yourself. Anyone know of a discord or something along those lines where I could search for such a thing? Cheers!

posts.author: Maximillian_Kane
posts.content:
Hey!

I don't know of any such places, but I think that's a great idea, so if you search for it and don't find anything, we could potentially discuss the possibility of creating a discord channel so that people who enjoy Single Player modules could get together to play. I know a few of our leaders would love that idea ( @Stagmeister @Mick Dagger

posts.author: Rumbly_The_Smith
posts.content: I've had no luck in finding any, and I think that'd be an awesome idea if you did decide to create one! I do understand however if that's too much of a hassle, as discord servers can be time consuming to moderate.

posts.author: Maximillian_Kane
posts.content:
Rumbly_The_Smith wrote:
May 16, 2021
I've had no luck in finding any, and I think that'd be an awesome idea if you did decide to create one! I do understand however if that's too much of a hassle, as discord servers can be time consuming to moderate. 
I don't think I or any of the other mods will have the time to do this properly. But if you were up to it... we'd gladly advertise it within our guild!

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
There *IS* NWN Connections :

https://nwn.fandom.com/wiki/Neverwinter_Connections

It was restarted in 2019.  I do not know if it is still active, however, nor in what way, shape, or form.  Back in the day, I used to play MP that way all the time (it is superior to PW play, tbh - one can actually have a DM and a group, for example).
